fanfic.name: Lost boys

fanfic.description: They are Lost Boys, all of them haunted by their own tragic fates. This is the story of how they met each other. A story of friendship, love, and betrayal

fanfic.name: Orchestra Boys

fanfic.description: orchestra and ballet kids were supposed to stay separated.the mingling of both in two boys was bound to end them in rivalry. but who knew what would happen if they decided to help each other out, starting something more than just a friendship...

fanfic.name: The Silent Melody
fanfic.author: author2
fanfic.description: A heartwarming tale of an unlikely friendship between two musicians in a bustling city.
fanfic.text: In the heart of the city, where the noise was relentless, there lived a violinist named Clara. She played under the streetlights, pouring her heart into each note that echoed against the cold pavement. One fateful night, a weary traveler named Leo stumbled upon her performance. Captivated by the haunting melodies, he found himself drawn to her music and eventually to her soul. As their lives intertwined, they discovered that the silent struggles of their pasts could only be healed through the power of friendship and the magic of music.
